claim: Red's screenplay was written by Jon Hoeber and Erich Hoeber, two German brothers.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film stars Bruce Willis , Morgan Freeman , John Malkovich , Mary-Louise Parker , Helen Mirren , and Karl Urban with German film director Robert Schwentke directing a screenplay by Jon Hoeber and Erich Hoeber .
